title: Root schema for the new PN Metadata Model
description: Root schema for the new PN Metadata Model 4. Version 1.0, Uwe Voges, u.voges@conterra.de

referencedProduct.title: ReferencedProduct
referencedProduct.description: referencedProduct as an aggregation of functionCode, name, url

functionCode.title: The functionCode
functionCode.description: The functionCode within the referencedProduct object.

name.title: The name
name.description: The name within the referencedProduct object.

url.title: The url
url.description: The url within the referencedProduct object.

KeywordAsObject.title: KeywordAsObject
KeywordAsObject.description: keyword as an aggregation of keyword name(s), type (e.g. Ocean) and a typelist schema.

keyword.title: The keyword
keyword.description: The keyword within the keyword object.

anyOf.title: One single keyword
anyOf.description: One keyword in the keyword array.

type.title: The keyword type.
type.description: The keyword type within the keyword object.

typeList.title: The keyword type schema.
typeList.description: The keyword type schema within the keyword object.

availability.title: availability - how to get access to the data
availability.description: availability - the kind of access, e.g. Data Store or EUMETCast

function.title: function code
function.description: the function code, e.g. download or view

protocol.title: availability access protocol
protocol.description: protocol to get access to the of the availability.

url.title: availability url
url.description: url of the of the availability

format4DataCite.title: format4DataCite
format4DataCite.description: is the format to be provided in the DataCite metadata upon doi export?

frequency.title: frequency
frequency.description: How frequently are products of the collection published

tool.title: format tool
tool.description: Format tool. Associated tool for reading the data for the format

individualName.title: The individualName schema
examples: European Organisation for the Exploitation of Meteorological Satellites

items.description: Linear ring, i.e. linestring or array of positions

access_constraint.title: The access_constraint schema
access_constraint.description: Applied to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property, and any special restrictions or limitations on obtaining false the resource. To clarify and simplify the representation of data policies in OLDA collection metadata only one block /<gmd:resourceConstraints>/<gmd:MD_LegalConstraints> will be used with one accessConstraints / otherConstraints, where the otherConstraints element (can be duplicated) includes the link to one of the licenses

alternateTitle.title: The alternateTitle schema
alternateTitle.description: Easier to remeber for customer than datasetTitle.
